version_description:
- Fixed editor tabs.
- Your allegiance is indicated by a green or red portrait border.
- Lots of new storylines.
- Strikes do more damage.
- "Fight Scene" characters are always in superhuman form.
- Numerous bug fixes.

- Fight Scenes now end properly when the player is defeated.
- Tunnels disappear over time.
- Improved name entry.
- Duplicate names confuse the alphabetized lists and are now prevented.
- Laser guns do not drain your superhuman energy.
- Improved parallax scrolling on the rooftop.

- Fixed name entry.
- Improved generated characters.
- Fairer divide between heroes and villains at the start of a new game.
- Various bug fixes.

- Certain privileges are now reserved for the team who owns a territory.
- All surviving members rally to defend the final territory.
- Losing teams may gang up against a dominant threat.
- Team-mates apologize for hitting each other by accident.
- More personal grudges in between team battles.
- Eating or drinking may cause someone to need the toilet.
- Improved "Commercial Break" message.
- Various bug fixes.

- New "Potion" item is the best source of super energy and can even transform someone who is not yet superhuman.
- New weapons include a trident (may not be properly distributed until you restart).
- New mission involves discovering someone's identity.
- More responses to witnessing someone transform.
- CPU characters spend more time in their superhuman form.
- Super energy goes down quicker (even when doing nothing).
- Longer delay on reincarnated characters (so that you can go to the "Deceased" roster and change their "Home" to preserve them!).
- Wider range of generated names.

- New "Super Punch" attack.
- New "Telepathy" power allows you to see the allegiances and identities of everybody else onscreen.
- More boots from the Wrestling Revolution game.
- Eliminated players can now control somebody else during a "Fight Scene".

- New "Super Punch" attack.
- New "Telepathy" power allows you to see the allegiances and identities of everybody else onscreen.
- More boots from the Wrestling Revolution game.
- Eliminated players can now control somebody else during a "Fight Scene".

- New "Hulk Smash" move from the front or at the legs.
- New weapons include an axe and grenades.
- New tail accessory on either the hips or thighs.
- New "uncontrollable" or "permanent" transformations.
- Guns now reload to prevent spamming.
- Lots of new storylines.
- Stat comparisons.

- Smoother breathing animation.
- Louder impact on new "Hulk Smash" move.
- Becoming the "next" version of an existing hero is named properly.
- Fixed scaling issues on new weapons.
- Quicker dialogue skipping (touch anywhere on the screen).
- Various bug fixes.

- 40% discount on the full upgrade! ($2.99 instead of $4.99)
- New "Alchemy" superpower allows you to replace an object in your hand.
- New "Manifestation" superpower creates new objects out of thin air.
- New "Slow Motion" superpower slows down time.
- Vending machines can be used by pressing T nearby (or smashing them open!).
- Fixed bug where multiple props spawn in the same place.

- Enhanced compatibility with latest hardware and operating systems.
- New "Alchemy" superpower allows you to replace an object in your hand.
- New "Manifestation" superpower creates new objects out of thin air.
* Please note that the "Slow Motion" effect does not currently work on iOS.
- Vending machines can be used by pressing T nearby (or smashing them open!).
- Fixed bug where multiple props spawn in the same place.

- Exclusive link to try the new survival sim, "Wrecked"!
- New costumes for every body part.
- New weapons include rifles and a wider variety of foods.
- New background sounds for each location.
- Explosives are more likely to explode when thrown, less likely when dropped.
- Changing relationships in the editor should always have the desired effect.
- Various bug fixes.

- 10 spooky new characters to celebrate Halloween!
- Lots of new costumes from the zombie spin-off, "Extra Lives".
- New flame powers from the hand or mouth!
- Wider display for phones.
- Various bug fixes & balancing.
Higher resolution display, making full use of notched screens in either landscape orientation.
Higher resolution display, making full use of notched screens in either landscape orientation.

- Higher resolution display, making full use of notched screens in either landscape orientation.
- Enhanced compatibility with iOS 14.
- Fewer onscreen ads (only between scenes).
